samples.question: So when did I go to this school?
samples.transcript: It was back in 1997, if I remember correctly. I was about 11 years old. I personally picked this school. that is what students do in the UK. You go and visit different secondary schools and the one that seems most fitting is the one that you choose to go to. But of course it was very difficult to get into this school because it was not right by our house. So it was not actually in the same borough. But anyway, I still got into this school and I was very proud to go there because I very much liked the subjects and all the facilities, particularly the drama room, the music rooms, And all the pianos, as I play piano personally. I have been playing since I was a small boy. I went to this school for about six years, if I remember correctly. And I stayed there to study at the college section. We call that sixth form. I very much liked the teachers at Southgate School and all the subjects that I took, particularly theatre studies and media studies. And I loved the facilities, but the one thing I did not like about it was the pupils, sadly enough. Because lots of them were bullies. There were about 1,500 pupils going to this huge school, if I remember correctly. And they were, lots of them were bullies. They were very rude. They could be racist at some points. But I had to deal with these problems and I had to deal with a lot of beat-ups too. I was beaten up many, many times on many, many days. In fact, there were many occasions where I have. Thank you very much. Great.

samples.question: And what is a balanced diet?
samples.transcript: That is actually a difficult question because depending on a person's weight, taste, or age, it can be different. For example, someone might have a healthy appetite and would always need a second helping. But on the other hand, another person might just be okay with a light meal. Because of those reasons, I would say that is, that might be different for different people. But generally, a healthy diet should include a range of fruits, vegetables, and healthy food. So yeah, that is what a healthy diet should be in my opinion. Absolutely.

samples.question: Now, why do you think some people choose to be vegetarians?
samples.transcript: Since I used to be a vegetarian for a short time, a couple of years ago, I can say that it depends on so many different reasons. For example, some people might decide to be vegetarians because Because of their health, because of concerns for animals or even some religious reasons. therefore I would have to say, maybe some other people decide to do that because they cannot afford to buy meat, fish, or chicken or any animal products, animal products. And yeah, these can be the reasons why people can choose vegetarianism. And one last question.
